name: At Edge
description:
Description

This game is an isometric wave-based horror shooter. Survive as long as you can as waves of zombies try to kill you. Level up and unlock new weapons. Don't Die.

Credits

Programming - toastymcvoid

Art/Design - Zeniyan & Teafuu

Message from the devs

Hey guys, toastymcvoid here. I just wanted to say, thank you for comming on to this page and looking at the game we have created. This is my first ever full-on game made with the Unity3D Engine. We are just a small team of three people who just decided to get together to create something fun.

I wanted to say thank you to the designers who worked tirelessly on this game. I also wanted to thank all the Studio 404, Riceball Lab, and all our other friends for encouraging us to make this work. Lastly, I want to thank you for trying our game out.

I hope that you enjoy this little creation of ours. Screen shot to me your the highest round you got to. 

Just make sure you don't die out there, okay?
